Text: Entrepreneurs' Relief (ER) ER may be available for certain business disposals and has the effect of charging the first £10 million of gains qualifying for the relief at an effective rate of 10%.
Cause: Entrepreneurs' Relief (ER) ER may be available for certain business disposals
Effect: charging the first £10 million of gains qualifying for the relief at an effective rate of 10%.
Sentence: <e1>Entrepreneurs' Relief (ER) ER may be available for certain business disposals</e1> and has the effect of <e2>charging the first £10 million of gains qualifying for the relief at an effective rate of 10%.</e2>
